meanings.definition: Investigating the unconscious mind through psychoanalysis.
meanings.sent1: Her psychoanalyzing helped her understand her dreams better.
meanings.sent2: The psychologist's psychoanalyzing revealed repressed memories.
meanings.sent3: The detective's psychoanalyzing of the crime scene was surprisingly insightful.
meanings.sent4: His psychoanalyzing of the painting's hidden meaning was like deciphering a secret code.
meanings.sent5: The artist's psychoanalyzing of his own emotions inspired his latest masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Analyzing the thoughts and behaviors of an individual using psychoanalytic techniques.
meanings.sent1: The therapist's psychoanalyzing helped the patient gain self-awareness.
meanings.sent2: She found psychoanalyzing to be a fascinating approach to understanding human behavior.
meanings.sent3: The cat's psychoanalyzing of the mouse's movements was comically intense.
meanings.sent4: Her psychoanalyzing of the situation was like peeling back layers of an onion.
meanings.sent5: The professor's psychoanalyzing of the text revealed hidden meanings to the students.
